job_tasks.justification: Developing and enhancing a data platform is a core software engineering task.
Integrating various data sources is a fundamental software engineering task to build a cohesive data system.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren (bijv. Row-level security, in staat zijn data te kunnen volgen, data retentie, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Implementing specific technical features like row-level security and data tracking falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: mogelijkheden te onderzoeken op het gebied van machine learning en GenAI.
job_tasks.justification: Exploring possibilities in ML and GenAI relates to understanding and potentially developing models.

job_tasks.phrase: Sparren met zowel business stakeholders als onze Security Officer, Privacy Officer en Legal team om uit te zoeken wat wel en niet kan alvorens te implementeren
job_tasks.justification: Consulting with various business and compliance functions to understand requirements and constraints fits into business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: draag je bij aan een data-gedreven cultuur door samen te werken met partners en stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to the business's data culture and collaborating with stakeholders aligns with business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: kennis en expertise in te zetten in de begeleiding en coaching van anderen.
soft_skills.justification: Coaching and guiding others is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Vanuit jouw ondernemendheid als Senior data engineer
soft_skills.justification: 'Ondernemendheid' signifies an entrepreneurial and proactive approach.

soft_skills.phrase: proactief mee te denken over de implementatie en optimalisatie van processen
soft_skills.justification: 'Proactief mee te denken' demonstrates initiative and a proactive mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: open staat om iets breder bezig te zijn en mogelijkheden te onderzoeken
soft_skills.justification: Being open to broader tasks and exploring new possibilities shows a willingness to learn and adapt.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met data analysts en data scientists
soft_skills.justification: Explicit mention of collaboration with other data professionals.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes core software engineering tasks related to developing and integrating a data platform (1.A.1), with a secondary exploratory interest in machine learning and GenAI (1.B.1). This makes it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role, as the primary work is software engineering that supports AI/ML initiatives.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is clear and detailed, providing sufficient information to confidently classify the role and its associated tasks and skills.
